question: 指摘
sourceMnemonic: Take your <kanji>finger</kanji> and <kanji>pluck</kanji> out the one thing out of all the things that needs <vocabulary>pointing out</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>identification</vocabulary>. Yep, that's the one. Pluck that one.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
